title: Surf Typography
content:
Hello, I am working on a surf project and have been finding some interesting typography. I was wondering if anyone knew what the typeface is for either/both of the images I have here.  
Any recommendations would be greatly appreciated (the word camps, on the first poster to be clear) Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [billabong\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101957/http:/typophile.com/files/billabong_logo.jpg) | 50.54 KB |
| [Surf2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101957/http:/typophile.com/files/Surf2.jpg) | 61.2 KB |
author: lmcglone

comments.content: Surf2 looks like [Glare](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101957/http:/www.dafont.com/glare.font?nb_ppp=50&af=on&text=SURF+WORLD+TORQAY) by dustBUST. Donâ€™t know if that is the original design.
